description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、学者、外交官，以马英九重要幕僚的身份闻名。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, scholar, and diplomat, known as a key aide to Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、中国国民党主席、台北市市长等职务。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China, Chairman of the Kuomintang, and Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统府的无给职荣誉职位，由总统遴聘。
description.en: An unpaid honorary position in the Office of the President of the Republic of China, appointed by the President.

description.zh-cn: 2012年中华民国总统选举期间，针对候选人蔡英文的争议案件。
description.en: A controversial case involving candidate Tsai Ing-wen during the 2012 Republic of China presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 2014年发生在台湾立法院的社会运动。
description.en: A social movement that took place in the Legislative Yuan of Taiwan in 2014.

description.en: A politician of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, former Premier of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在马英九担任总统期间，金溥聪获聘为总统府资政。
description.en: During Ma Ying-jeou's presidency, King Pu-tsung was appointed as a Senior Advisor to the President.

relationships.target: 国家安全会议 (中华民国)

description.zh-cn: 在马英九担任台北市市长期间，金溥聪任其副市长。
description.en: King Pu-tsung served as Deputy Mayor under Taipei Mayor Ma Ying-jeou.

relationships.target: 国立台南第二高级中学

description.zh-cn: 因对壹传媒电视新闻尺度的歧见而拆伙。
description.en: Parted ways due to disagreements over the standards for Next Media's television news.

description.zh-cn: 金溥聪担任2024年总统选举国民党籍参选人侯友宜竞选办公室的执行长。
description.en: King Pu-tsung serves as the Executive Director of the campaign office for KMT presidential candidate Hou Yu-ih for the 2024 election.

description.zh-cn: 金溥聪与史亚平为外交特考同梯受训人员。
description.en: King Pu-tsung and Shih Yea-ping were in the same training cohort for the diplomatic service examination.

description.zh-cn: 金溥聪公开评论太阳花学运，表示民主法治社会不会姑息此类违法暴力行为。
description.en: King Pu-tsung publicly commented on the Sunflower Student Movement, stating that a democratic society governed by the rule of law would not tolerate such illegal and violent acts.

description.zh-cn: 金溥聪作为国安会秘书长处理张显耀涉嫌泄密案，并调任其职务。
description.en: As Secretary-General of the National Security Council, King Pu-tsung handled the suspected leak case involving Chang Hsien-yao and reassigned him.

description.zh-cn: 因冯光远发表关于金溥聪与马英九有“特殊性关系”的言论，金溥聪对冯光远提起长达数年的诽谤诉讼。
description.en: King Pu-tsung filed a multi-year defamation lawsuit against Feng Kuang-yuan over Feng's remarks about a "special relationship" between King and Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 冯光远在部落格和社交媒体上发表文章，指金溥聪和马英九有“特殊性关系”，并使用“男妓”等词语，构成诽谤和公然侮辱。
description.en: Feng Kuang-yuan published articles on his blog and social media alleging a "special relationship" between King Pu-tsung and Ma Ying-jeou, using terms like "male prostitute," which constituted defamation and public insult.

description.zh-cn: 王拓在记者会上引用检举信，指控金溥聪勾结检察官企图构陷民进党籍总统候选人谢长廷。
description.en: In a press conference, Wang Tuo cited a whistleblower letter to accuse King Pu-tsung of colluding with prosecutors to frame DPP presidential candidate Frank Hsieh.

description.zh-cn: 康裕成在记者会上引用检举信，指控金溥聪勾结检察官企图构陷民进党籍总统候选人谢长廷。
description.en: In a press conference, Kang Yu-cheng cited a whistleblower letter to accuse King Pu-tsung of colluding with prosecutors to frame DPP presidential candidate Frank Hsieh.

description.zh-cn: 颜圣冠在记者会上引用检举信，指控金溥聪勾结检察官企图构陷民进党籍总统候选人谢长廷。
description.en: In a press conference, Yen Sheng-kuan cited a whistleblower letter to accuse King Pu-tsung of colluding with prosecutors to frame DPP presidential candidate Frank Hsieh.

description.zh-cn: 在关于是否处罚走路吸烟的立法争议中，时任卫生署长杨志良公开表达支持金溥聪的立场。
description.en: During the legislative controversy over penalizing smoking while walking, then-Minister of Health Yang Chih-liang publicly expressed support for King Pu-tsung's position.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年总统大选中，金溥聪作为马英九的竞选操盘手，主导了对蔡英文宇昌案的攻击。
description.en: In the 2012 presidential election, King Pu-tsung, as Ma Ying-jeou's campaign manager, led the attacks on Tsai Ing-wen regarding the Yu Chang case.

description.zh-cn: 杨秋兴在2010年五都选举中参选大高雄市长，争取蓝军选票，对国民党的总得票数造成影响。
description.en: Yang Chiu-hsing's candidacy for mayor of Greater Kaohsiung in the 2010 five-municipality elections appealed to pan-blue voters, impacting the Kuomintang's overall vote count.
